short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show you random nft assets in new tab from given wallet address

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display your art collection on every new tab you open! NFT Wallpaper uses the OpenSea API to beautify display your NFT Art right when you start a new tab!
